description: On server create, we do an extra image show to check for kernel_id and ramdisk_id properties. This is duplicating code in the compute api.
title: OSAPI duplicates kernel_id/ramdisk_id lookup

comments.content: On server create, we do an extra image show to check for kernel_id and ramdisk_id properties. This is duplicating code in the compute api.
